autoFocus.description: Does the drawer switch the focus to its DOM node after unfolding?
autoFocus.description_zh: 抽屉展开后是否将焦点切换至其 DOM 节点

:afterOpenChange.description: The callback after the animation when switching drawers
:afterOpenChange.description_zh: 切换抽屉时动画结束后的回调

className.description: Drawer container outer className setting, if you need to set the outermost layer, please use rootClassName
className.description_zh: Drawer 容器外层 className 设置，如果需要设置最外层，请使用 rootClassName

:closeIcon.description: Custom close icon. 5.7.0: Hide the close button when set to null or false
:closeIcon.description_zh: 自定义关闭图标。5.7.0：设置为 null 或 false 时隐藏关闭按钮

:contentWrapperStyle.description: It can be used to set the style of the content part of the Drawer package.
:contentWrapperStyle.description_zh: 可用于设置 Drawer 包裹内容部分的样式

destroyOnClose.description: Destroy the child elements in the Drawer when closing
destroyOnClose.description_zh: 关闭时销毁 Drawer 里的子元素

:extra.description: The operation area in the upper right corner of the drawer
:extra.description_zh: 抽屉右上角的操作区域

forceRender.description_zh: 预渲染 Drawer 内元素

:getContainer.description: Specify the node mounted by Drawer and display it in the container. false is mounted at the current position.
:getContainer.description_zh: 指定 Drawer 挂载的节点，并在容器内展现，false 为挂载在当前位置

:height.description: Height, used when placement is top or bottom
:height.description_zh: 高度，在 placement 为 top 或 bottom 时使用

keyboard.description: Whether to support keyboard esc close
keyboard.description_zh: 是否支持键盘 esc 关闭

maskClosable.description: Click whether the mask layer is allowed to be closed
maskClosable.description_zh: 点击蒙层是否允许关闭

:push.description: Used to set the push behavior of multi-layer Drawer
:push.description_zh: 用于设置多层 Drawer 的推动行为

:rootStyle.description: Can be used to set the style of the outermost container of Drawer. The difference from style is that the effect node includes mask
:rootStyle.description_zh: 可用于设置 Drawer 最外层容器的样式，和 style 的区别是作用节点包括 mask

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

size.description: Default drawer width (or height), default 378px and large 736px
size.description_zh: 预设抽屉宽度（或高度），default 378px 和 large 736px

:style.description: Design the Drawer container style. If you only need to set the content part, please use styles.body
:style.description_zh: 设计 Drawer 容器样式，如果你只需要设置内容部分请使用 styles.body

events.name: onClose
events.description: Click the callback of the mask layer or the top left corner cross or cancel button
events.description_zh: 点击遮罩层或左上角叉或取消按钮的回调
